full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement**
## **Title**
Block 2 Structural Systems and Investigations Contract
## **Reference Number**
WS3855089331
## **Amendment Number**
6
## **Solicitation Number**
WS3855089331
## **Tender Closing Date**
2023-05-16 14:00:00
## **Expected Contract Start Date**
2023-02-16
## **Expected Contract End Date**
2023-12-31
## **Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
## **Contracting Entity Address**
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
## **Managed By**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
## **Procurement Category**
Construction Services
## **Procurement Method**
Competitive - Open Bidding
## **Notice Type**
Request for Proposal
## **Notice URL**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15803497
## **Contact Information**
Lisa Hampel
Technical Writer | Tech Writer at mycompany.com
345 Main St, Suite 100, Toronto, ON M4C 3J4, Canada
Phone: 647-456-7890
Email: [lisa@mycompany.com](mailto:lisa@mycompany.com)
## **Services Required**
The successful contractor shall conduct the following services:

* Demolition of existing finishes and abatement
* Restoration of finishes (access panels and tiles required)
* Provide safe platforms
* Ground Penetrating Radar (GPR) scanning and foundation survey
* Drilling to confirm the size and layout of structural steel
* Drilling through wall assemblies

Please refer to the Invitation to Tender (ITT) document for a comprehensive overview of the scope.

### **Notice Details**

This is a Government of Canada request for proposal (RFP) tender announcement for the provision of construction services for Block 2 Structural Systems and Investigations.

**Background Information**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) with the Headquarters located in Ottawa, requires the services of a licensed contractor to complete structural investigations and other related tasks at the parliament buildings.

The successful contractor will be required to demonstrate their ability to complete the required tasks in a safe and efficient manner.

### **Key Dates**

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-16 14:00:00
* **Expected
